ChildCareTech.controller

Class CheckpointController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ChildCareTech.controller.CheckpointController

  • public class CheckpointController
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides implementation for methods in the UserSessionFacade interface that operate with Checkpoint entities.
